PRAYER: Writ Petition filed under Article 226 of the Constitution of India for
issuance of Writ of Mandamus, directing the respondent to pay the amount
towards encashment of 91 days of earned leaves surrendered by the petitioner
in the year from 2010 to 2017 before his retirement either based on his
monthly wages of the respective months of surrender of those earned leaves,
together with 18% interest per annum from the respective due dates or based
on the monthly wages payable on the month of his retirement together with
18% interest from the date of his retirement within a time frame as may be
fixed by this Court.
